comments.html: Why not throw in some WAN optimization at the right parts?
comments.name: Rob Marković

comments.html: WAN optimization will not reduce the latency and it's questionable what the compression factor would be. Also, 1Gbps+ WAN optimization products are still rare.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: You could try Exinda's 1 Gbps+ products - 6060 (up to 1 Gbps), 8060 (up to 5 Gbps), 10060 (up to 20 Gbps) for visibility and QoS Assurance (control) and then intelligently accelerate the traffic that needs to be accelerated.  Check the products out at www.exinda.com
comments.name: Kevin Suitor

comments.html: Could you get me in touch with someone who could answer in-depth questions?
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: http://blog.exinda.com/contact-us/ ask for a product manager to contact you
comments.name: Kevin Suitor
